source.63fa7140:
Though all the features are greatly connected to each other but relation between (mean_radius,mean_parameter) and (mean_radius,mean_parameter)
are so dominent to differentiate between  effected and uneffected.

Importent insight:

1.Women having mean_radius less then 17.5 and mean_parameter less then 120 are effected by Breast_Cancer.And rest are safe.

2.Women having mean_radius less then 17 and mean_parameter less then 1000 are effected by Breast_Cancer.And rest are safe.
